National Security

North Korea Claims Test of ‘Super-Large Multiple Rocket Launchers’

North Korea claimed to conduct a test of “super-large multiple rocket launchers” on Thursday afternoon, state news propaganda outlet KCNA announced on Friday.

Ben Kew

Chinese Catholics Say Vatican-China Accord Fuels Christian Persecution

A number of the Chinese Catholic faithful have expressed regret over the Vatican agreement with the Chinese Communist government, saying it has emboldened officials in their persecution of Christians.

Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
